name: Cisco AIR-PI21AG-A-K9 802.11b/g PCI Wi-Fi Adapter
Antenna: Integrated dual-band 2.4/5-GHz, 1-dBi, effective-gain antenna on a two-meter cable
Features: [CISCO Wireless Security Suite, Bundled with comprehensive, easy-to-use client network management utilities to provide a secure, intuitive, and convenient way to manage and configure the adapter, CISCO LEAP Single Sign-on, CISCO Wireless Domain Services (WDS)]
